welcome.title: Welcome to Vibe Kanban
welcome.description: Let's get you set up in just four quick steps.

agentConfig.editorHelper: This editor will be used to open task attempts and project files.
agentConfig.customCommandHelper: Enter the command to run your custom editor. Use spaces for arguments (e.g., "code --wait").

githubLogin.title: Sign in with GitHub (Optional)
githubLogin.description: Connect your GitHub account to create pull requests directly from Vibe Kanban.
githubLogin.codeCopied: Code copied! Complete the authorization on GitHub.
githubLogin.benefit1: Create pull requests from task attempts
githubLogin.benefit2: Push changes and create branches automatically

error.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
error.denied: GitHub authorization was denied. You can try again.
error.expired: Device code expired. Please try again.

safetyNotice.title: Safety Notice
safetyNotice.warning1: Vibe Kanban runs AI coding agents with
safetyNotice.warning3: by default, giving them unrestricted access to execute code and run commands on your system.
safetyNotice.importantText: Always review what agents are doing and ensure you have backups of important work. This software is experimental - use it responsibly.

feedback.title: Help Improve Vibe Kanban
feedback.optInLabel: Share usage data to help us improve the product
feedback.optInHelper: We collect high-level usage metrics and performance data, but never your code or personal information.
feedback.collectGitHub: GitHub profile info for important updates only
feedback.collectUsage: High-level usage metrics and feature usage
feedback.doNotCollect: We do NOT collect task contents, code, or project names
feedback.settingsNote: You can change this preference anytime in Settings.
